1. City Council

City Council
============

* 2nd Tuesday of every month in Council Chambers at City Hall

Special Meetings are called by the Mayor.

* Judy B. Cochran, Mayor
* Alan Cook, Mayor Pro-tem
* Dr. Ray Luna, Alderman
* Bobby Jackson Sr., Alderman
* Andy Evans, Alderman
* Marty Drake, Alderman

The term of office is two years.

### City Charter - General Law City - Type A
